name: Ghost Ship - OpenGL Edition
description:
Ghost Ship - (Jam Edition) [OpenGL]

Fly as far as you can in an ambient environment. 

Created in 72 hours for LDJam46 

Rate it Here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/ghost-ship-jam-edition

Downloadable Version:  https://dylanfries.itch.io/ghostship

- - - Controls - - -

Arrows / Joystick - Fly - (Inverted) Spacebar / Triggers - Booster (Uses more fuel) Escape - Quit Return/Enter - Reset

(At Game Over) - Spacebar / Triggers - Reset Game. 

Controls should work cross platform fairly widely but if you encounter problems please let me know!

Any feedback is appreciated.
